title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body:
Just patiently waiting for URF over here like it will happen before computers become extinct. . .
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
patiently????? Stuff these other game give us URF
EXACTLY
lol me too
URF has already finished, it will be back next year guys {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Well, the least sped things done is probably choose that name... It suits ya ;).
Jokes aside, Riot has recently introduced "Rotating Game Modes", this means that there will be a new game mode every weekend (including Friday and Monday[thankfully]). Since there are not over 52 (weeks in a year) game modes, or even 20 game modes, this means that every game mode will be released at least 2 times during the year. Enjoy the good news!

here are the links:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-1

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/rotating-game-mode-queue-now-live-5

Whoever didn't get to play it r.i.p
why oh why cant you bring back doombots pls pls pls pls pls pls bring it back
URF or Doombots Agreed
Preach. Doombots was so good. {{item:3070}}

nexus siege.... SERIOUSLY 
AGAIN? THATS 3 TIMES NOW
So they put urf out for two weekends within a few weeks of each other and then don't anymore... no one cares about ascension or definitely not dominion or nexus siege or hexakill..
I'm sorry but for me ascension is by far the least interesting game mode of them all. I'd much rather play normals. Rip URF 2k16.
No. Nexus siege is horrible.{{item:3070}}

In my opinion Riot won't bring back URF and Doom Bots as Riot couldn't give two shits about the OCE community. Lets face it the only reason they made the OCE server is so that they could get rid of us and stop us from complaining about lag all the time.
I'm surprised they even bother to let us have updates.{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
yeah
The truth is out
An example of that is the new champion select. If you read the youtube video it states it isnt being released in Oceania. TY RITO!
Why you gotta make us wait so long for urf rito ;-;
new ascension is bad now
{{champion:37}} URF Please
OH awesome we have 4 game rotations this month that no one gives a shit about. Thnx RIOT....
What about URF i want to play URF
Too late. It already came out twice and riot said it will only come out two times.
Nah, they said it would be released at least two times
What people are saying riot is that urf is cool and they want more... besides irelia op
pls bring back urf this after these 4
riot if you could organise specific gamemodes for public and school holidays that would be nice (eg. urf on school holidays)
Not everyone wants to play with school students all day, face it... Even you don't want to play with people in primary school.
i report all primary school kids
UUUUUUURF!!
Urf
when you want urf but you dont get it{{champion:32}} {{item:3649}}
FFS noone plays nexus siege and its already been out 2wice give me mirror mode
Bit of a boring game mode honestly :/ only reason I ever played it was because I wanted the icons the first time.
URF and one for all are da best!

They took away all the action in ascension. Stealing was all the fun, where my poisons could ascend me back to life after i die. And think about the marksman and mages that won't be able to ascend with all the enemies that would camp the middle. It's basically like turning a baron into a rift herald, but even worse. Never playing ascension again.
still think Xerath looks awesome still such a fun champ to play thankyou riot for the make and upgrades very impressive :D but my main man Lucian bring the rain ;)

You know, either Riot staff read these comment sections and just dont give a shit, or they dont bother to read them, because we should have already at more urf, its what the playerbase wants and its clear everytime you read the comments
Their doing nexus siege again{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} WHY NOT URF
Just waitin' for nemesis draft... {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}} doom bots
YAY, a map we can play hide and seek on...ish

Since the Champion that becomes Ascended is now determined by who captures the relic, can Execute moves finally work on the Ancient Ascendant now instead of leaving it on 1 HP? e.g. Feast, Consume, Smite, etc.
